docs.text: wild things is a suspenseful thriller starring matt dillon , denise richards , and neve campbell that deals with all the issues ; sex , love , murder , and betrayal .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the setting of the film is a town named blue bay .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it consists of many swamps and slums and , on the other hand , rich estates owned by the town's different benefactors .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film opens just before the beginning of a senior seminar at the town's ritzy , expensive high school .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is here that we meet all of the core characters .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there's guidance counselor sam lombardo , police officers ray duquette and gloria perez , dark mysterious senior suzie toller , and the popular head cheerleader kelly van ryan .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we first see that all of the senior girls are smitten with the handsome guidance counselor , but none more than kelly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: throughout the first portion of the film we see how far kelly will go to get sam until she accuses him of rape .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: shortly after , suzie , too , confesses that sam raped her as well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this pushes kelly's sex craving mother , sandra , to stop at nothing until sam is convicted .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: during the trial , kelly gives a teary confession of how sam raped her .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , it is later revealed by suzie that sam never raped either of the girls , it was all a vengeful plan against the guidance counselor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after sam is cleared , kelly's mother pays sam a very substantial amount of cash in order for him not to sue her .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is then revealed that sam , kelly , and suzie were all in on it together .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is here that the film starts to reveal just who is being honest with each other and who has their own hidden agenda .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: matt dillon stars as sam lombardo .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sam is the kind of guy that every woman would like to sink their claws into , and sam obviously knows it and uses it to his own advantage .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he isn't the obvious best of actors , but dillon does give a convincing performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , his talents seem to be rendered useless near the end of the film , making it look as though his character has lost all of his ethics and principles , although he never had many to start out with in the first place .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: neve campbell , who most people relate to scream and scream 2 , plays blue bay outcast suzie toller .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: suzie obviously has some serious issues to deal with which are obvious from her first scene in the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: campbell is very successful with this character , adding the slightest bit of charm to a seemingly repulsive character and making her fun to watch .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: playing kelly van ryan is denise richards .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: kelly is your typical , rich , sexy , head cheerleader who thinks she can have any man she choses , like her sexpot mother sandra .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one of the most interesting things about this film is how it compares and contrasts the relationship between kelly and her mother .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: denise richards , still hot off the press from starship troopers , gives the most interesting performance in the entire film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the beginning , kelly looks to be a paper thin character , but richards adds a little more spice and ultimately makes the character not only sexy , but dominating as well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: kevin bacon gives one of his fair performances as ray duquette .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this character looks to be one of the most boring , predictable in the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , it is a relationship revealed between him and suzie that adds depth to his story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: still , the film doesn't seem to gain much from bacon's performance , only his name .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the supporting cast , theresa russell plays the much oversexed sandra van ryan , daphne rubin-vega gives an unappealing performance as cop gloria perez , and bill murray shines as sam's lawyer , ken bowden .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: hats off to murray for adding the perfect touch of comedy to the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although wild things was displayed by the press as being an erotic thriller , the eroticism , which is portrayed with good taste , is kept to a minimum and focuses more on the plot and the relationships between the characters .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is truly a very good film worth seeing if your looking for a movie with a thick plot filled with it's share of twists .
docs.label: positive
